frontend_courses.title: Introduction to rUv-Swarm
frontend_courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of rUv-Swarm technology and distributed AI systems

frontend_courses.title: Advanced Swarm Patterns
frontend_courses.description: Master complex coordination patterns and fault-tolerant swarm architectures

frontend_courses.title: AI-Powered Development
frontend_courses.description: Build intelligent applications using AI agents and swarm coordination

backend_courses.title: rUv-swarm Foundations
backend_courses.description: Master the fundamentals of swarm intelligence and neural networks. This comprehensive course covers everything from basic concepts to hands-on implementation using the rUv-swarm framework.
backend_courses.prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge recommended. No prior AI/ML experience required.
backend_courses.learning_objectives:
By the end of this course, you will:
• Understand neural network fundamentals and architecture
• Master Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) concepts
• Build and train your first neural network using rUv-swarm
• Optimize network parameters for real-world datasets
• Implement basic swarm intelligence algorithms

modules.title: Introduction to Neural Networks
modules.description: Understand the building blocks of artificial intelligence

lessons.title: What is a Neural Network?
lessons.content_preview: Neural networks are computational models inspired by the human brain. Learn about neurons, connections, weights, and activation functions.

backend_courses.title: rUv-swarm Practitioner
backend_courses.description: Deep dive into the rUv-swarm codebase and learn to modify and extend the system. Master the FANN library, understand PSO implementation, and build your own neural network solutions.
backend_courses.prerequisites: Completion of rUv-swarm Foundations. Strong C programming skills required.
backend_courses.learning_objectives:
By the end of this course, you will:
• Master the FANN (Fast Artificial Neural Network) library
• Analyze and modify the rUv-swarm source code
• Understand PSO implementation details and parameters
• Tune hyperparameters for optimal performance
• Adapt the system for new datasets and problems

backend_courses.title: rUv-swarm Architect
backend_courses.description: Design and implement advanced swarm intelligence systems. Learn to extend rUv-swarm with new optimization algorithms, deploy containerized solutions, and architect distributed cognitive systems.
backend_courses.prerequisites: Completion of rUv-swarm Practitioner. Advanced programming and system design experience.
backend_courses.learning_objectives:
By the end of this course, you will:
• Implement alternative optimization algorithms (GA, ACO)
• Design modular, extensible AI architectures
• Containerize and deploy rUv-swarm applications
• Architect solutions for complex, real-world problems
• Create comprehensive AI system documentation

download_instructions.method_1: Copy frontend/src/store/useAppStore.js for basic course structure
download_instructions.method_2: Copy backend/scripts/init_sample_data.py for comprehensive course content
download_instructions.method_4: This JSON file contains all structured content for easy import
